reviews.productTitle: 10 Pack SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light 15Amp 120/277Volt Rocker Single Pole Wall Switch, Automatic On/Off Sensor
reviews.text: These are great! You just wire them like any other switch and you have a built in night light. I have found them especially useful in hallways and in garages (where I may tumble down stairs if I don't have a bit of light). Easy to install and they work.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025
reviews.title: Easy to install and they work!

reviews.productTitle: 10 Pack SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light 15Amp 120/277Volt Rocker Single Pole Wall Switch, Automatic On/Off Sensor
reviews.text: I recently installed the SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light in my home, and it has been a great addition. The built-in LED night light is a fantastic feature, especially in hallways and bathrooms where extra visibility at night is helpful. The automatic on/off sensor works well, adjusting the brightness depending on the ambient light in the room, which helps to save energy. The installation process was straightforward and comparable to a standard light switch, making it a good choice for anyone comfortable with basic electrical work. The switch itself has a nice modern design and feels durable. One thing to note is that the LED light is quite bright, which might be a bit too much for some people in a bedroom setting. However, it’s perfect for areas where you need a bit of guidance at night. Overall, I highly recommend the SOZULAMP Light Switch for anyone looking to add a convenient night light feature to their home without the need for separate plug-in night lights. It’s functional, energy-efficient, and looks great.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2024
reviews.title: Convenient Light Switch with Built-In Night Light and Automatic Sensor

reviews.productTitle: 10 Pack SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light 15Amp 120/277Volt Rocker Single Pole Wall Switch, Automatic On/Off Sensor
reviews.text: I want to upgrade my old light switches on a budget. I happen to see this option and find it a good idea to add a few lights around the house to easily navigate at night. I like the brightness, durability, and simplicity. I’m no electrician but I’m able to replace all light switches by myself. I bought 1 box of 10 pcs. I worried a bit as some reviews say some pieces doesnt work. I’m happy that I didn't experience any problems-- all 10 work well! It also matches with other switches I bought. Overall, I would recommend this product.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
reviews.title: Guides me at night

reviews.text: Installed several around my home. The switches that get used the most still work. The switches that haven't been moved in a while seemed to have burned out and stopped working. Even the physical switch stopped working. Main point, if they sit and aren't used, they can burn out.

reviews.productTitle: 10 Pack SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light 15Amp 120/277Volt Rocker Single Pole Wall Switch, Automatic On/Off Sensor
reviews.text: I am remodeling my house and decided to add some lighted switched to the bathroom. I installed 2 switched for 2 sets of lights and worked fine. A few months later, we finally got the chance to install a lighted mirror and a exhaust fan. The switches didn't work. Thinking we did something wrong with the new wiring, we traced all the wires back up to the attic and confirmed all is fine. Only thing left was the switches. So, we tried the remaining 8 switches and still nothing. Pulled an old switch form the garbage and it worked. Went to HD, bought a package of 10 new switches and now all is fine.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.title: 8 of the 10 did not work.

reviews.productTitle: 10 Pack SOZULAMP Light Switch with LED Night Light 15Amp 120/277Volt Rocker Single Pole Wall Switch, Automatic On/Off Sensor
reviews.text: I will admit that my expectations were not very high, but I really was pleasantly surprised by these switches. In the past you always needed an additional wire for light up switches so I was concerned to see that these did not, but I was impressed at the light produced by their nightlight feature. The light sensor inside of the switch works very well so that the nightlight feature is only on when the room is dark.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.title: These are great switches for the money and the nightlight is better than expected
